channel.title: Nate and Di Show
channel.itunes:author: Nate and Di
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Front Butt Studios Production
channel.itunes:summary:
Online since April 2005, NaD is an irreverent mix of liberal comedic social commentary performed using a unique talk-reality sketch format. We call it Gonzo Reality Infotainment. You call it whatever you will.
Shows will be added to the feed occasionally, so stay subscribed!

item.title: Nate and Di are back online.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: The Nate and Di Show maybe be on hiatus, but Nate and Di are back online. If you are interested in keeping up with their unusual antics, then visit www.nateanddi.com, and subscribe to their new feed. This feed may be updated again at some point in the future, so stay subscribed for when we do.

item.title: NaD Episode 88: Smokin with Jebus - the Returnisode.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Podcastings most insane and irreverent gonzo couple have re-entered the realm of pod. Despite the fact that the real Nate and Di stop by to whine like a couple of bleeding-heart liberals and chastise us for our blasphemous shenanigans before we even start, we are pushing the envelope on our return episode and are holding no punches. Join us for the first time in 366 days as we pick up where we left off with some wise-ass chicanery and discover a new use for the Good Book in a response to a recent Supreme Court Decision about Jesus and our favorite sacramental herb.
item.itunes:subtitle: NaD Episode 88: Smokin with Jebus - the Returnisode.

item.title: NaD Episode 87: The Elevator Goes Up and Down
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: We are back. And just like an elevator ride, this one is all over the place. We join you as Di has just finished over 4 cups of coffee, so please excuse the added energy level. Today, we share tales from our month-long Hiatal Holiday from the podcast and catch everyone up with the happenings at Front Butt. Listen in as we discuss hackers, growing our garden oasis, tell you how to hatch some of your very own prehistoric beasts, welcome some new blood to The 138, and go on an elevator ride NaD-Style. The messages are also back with a vengence, so leave us one for a future show. Dont forget, the Podcasting and Portable Media Expo is almost 2 months away, so help us make it out there by making a donation of any amount, and we will send you some shit from Front Butt. We will be back again this weekend, so listen now, while it is fresh.

item.title: NaD Episode 86: The Ghosts That Haunt Us
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Not what one might expect from us on 06-06-06, but we decided to stray from the flock and totally ignore the sinister significance of the date... Instead, we share some ghosts from our past and give you this somewhat unusually formatted episode of NaD. Five Years ago last weekend, we found ourselves homeless and unemployed in the same day after the owners of a drive-in theater we were managing decided to close the doors forever. June 6 also happens to be the 80th anniversary of the first drive in theater, so join us as we take a trip down memory lane and take a tour of the Keysville Drive-In, our former home and place of business, following half a decade of total neglect. Throughout this sound-seeing tour, we discuss how we came to work for the drive-in, share a few stories about our experiences, and even tell some of the gory details of the demise of an American icon. We will Return back to a more normal show on episode 87 with a bottle of absinthe, more classic Steve Dupont, a special new correspondant, and one of our best hi-jinks ever. I apologize for the occasional iRiver audio irregularities, but we happened to be close to this place for the first time since we moved away, so neither of us could resist taking a look-see. Enjoy.

item.title: NaD Episode 85: Deport us please.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Just in time for the post-Memorial day return to work, it is NaD 85. Join us as we kick off our 2006 Portable Media and Podcasting Expo fundraiser, get stoned from an apple and a magnifying glass, play an awesome audio submission, discuss another concerning piece of proposed legislation in the SC State House involving possible deportation of drug users, get an outdated traffic report, and tell you what we have planned for Summer 2006. This one is all over the place... but we will be back with more unexplainable mischief very soon, so enjoy this one while its fresh.

item.title: NaD Episode 84: Does Privacy Have a Smell
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: NaD Episode 84 is hot off the press and headed directly for your ears, and for one lucky person out there, it is also going for her nose. We start off with a humorous call Di placed to ATT consumer relations last weekend, and discuss the allegations that 3 major telecoms have turned over private phone records to the NSA. With a follow-up call to our own telephone service provider, we cool off a bit. Next, we switch gears and actually invade someone elses privacy, a nice stranger-lady who allowed us to get totally baked in her car without her knowing.(at least until afterwards, hehe) We should totally apologize to Dave Slusher at EGC for bringing an all new meaning to podcast Clambakes. NaD News sees the introduction of the new segment, The Disgusting Sex Lives of Republican Nastymen, including a hilarious clip of an abortionist insisting that he fucked goats when he grew up on a farm, a couple of pedos and a slew of other disgusting deeds you cant even imagine. Steve Dupont exposes the underbelly of our show with an expose on our new Employee Training Tape. To finish off, we discuss the benefits listeners receive by visiting the site, and close out with some more sage advice from Di. So much shit on this one, we had to save 2 segments for our next installment. So stay subscribed for that, and again, we must warn everyone, dont try this at home.

item.title: NaD Episode 83: The Martha Stewart Morning Glory Trip
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: A NaD News Special Report. Get ready for some hard-hitting journalism folks, as we follow our beat to K-Mart and purchase 30 packets of Martha Stewart Morning Glory seeds following reports that they create an LSD-like trip. We were alerted to this story Friday by our friends at the Washington Post, who warned the world of this possible epidemic in an article by Staff Writer Theresa Vargas. Tonight, we turn her sensationalistic story into reality right before your ears.

item.title: NaD Episode 82: The Alpha and Omega According to Nate and Di
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Back again. Back again. Sometimes, an episode develops a strong theme without us really thinking about it. I love it when that happens. This show is one of those, and happens to focus on Alpha and Omega, or the beginning and the end... A year after our infamous church show, we revisit religion with an educational and entertaining lesson on the Alpha from the good book of Genesis titled Bible Bullshit Exposed after having some more of Kent Hovinds creationist hogwash shoved down our throats during a recent trip back home. Another special report from Steve Dupont leaves us wondering what the fuck all the foreigners are saying abouts us, and we discuss a new segment coming up on NaD News. We also scold our younger listeners for being Jr. stalkers, and take it to the Omega with a skit inspired by a recent email from an ex. Some great tunes, a few funny voice mails, and an announcement about how you can win a NaD t-shirt, hat, and goodies bag just for making a 30-60 second promo for the show. Not as funny as the last one, but funnier than the one before that, so yeah, here it is. Episode 83 is in the works already, and it is a riot, so we will be back before you expect it. Subscribe, download, listen, and enjoy... Then write and tell us about your thoughts.

item.title: NaD Video Podcast v.1.1
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: We are working feverishly on the next TWO NaD episodes right now, but in the meantime, here is our first attempt at a vidcast. We recorded this on a 4 year old 15 dollar logitech quickcam, so the quality is not quite up to par, but not bad at all for the price and age of the thing. The intro is fun, plus, we give everyone a brief tour of Front Butt Studios. We produced this cast including the intro, which required quite a bit of editing, in less than 3 hours, and the actual video was made in one take that took less than 6 minutes. We are working on some cool ideas for new video projects, and I assure yall the next one will be of more substance and quality. Plus, I will also promise to back off the mic, and Di will lean in a bit and talk louder next time. But hey, for our first experiment in video, the product is not horrible...well, too horrible. We have had this up on our site for a few days now, and the response we got made us decide to put it on the feed for everyone else. Enjoy.

item.title: NaD Episode 81: Attack of the Imploding-Head Clones
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: OK... so I usually listen to each episode as it is uploading and I very seldom laugh out loud while listening to us... I have been cracking up on this one, so consider that a seal of approval. Join us as we discuss our newfound namesakes... also referred to as clones in the show. Next, we take you along as we rescue our parakeet Rigby, who became trapped inside of our recliner this week. NaD news moves in a new direction with our first piece with Steve live with us on the show. In the 2nd pet related accident in this show, our fish Gary Bibbs head imploded sometime today(It really imploded), so we honor him with a funeral right on the show. Some new tunes, an important announcement, and a few other things round out this, the 81st episode of NaD.

item.title: NaD Episode 79: Mess with a Bean, Deal with the Burrito
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: OK, so it is not the blowout down there on 78, but it is an honest-to-Bob solid show...We are joined in the Studio by Patrick from The Charleston City Paper for this one, so we decided to let him in on a few secrets from the masters as we speak with P Dilly from the Podcast Pickle about everything from Podcating trends to The infamoud PodShow contract. We also chat up the immigration debate with our favorite Hispandex, The Keeme himself! NaD News continues to swerve off the beaten path with a true story about a crazy new law proposed in the SC House Of Representatives and the conclusion of Steve Duponts series, Let's Fuck with People. The Show is also turning a year old later this week, and NaD 80 is already in the works, so leave us a voicemail or send us a message!

item.title: NaD Episode 78: The Conspiracy of the Blow-job Killers
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Our best episode EVER! So much shit on this one I dont know where to start...You join us as Nate is caught snorting coke off of Dis ass, and then Di gives Nate a Blowjob and finishes up by getting the stripper off. We also revisit the church from NaD 05 and piss on the pews. Then, we switch gears and report some hard-hitting exclusive revelations by revealing the identities of the killers of both JFK and Kurt Cobain, and then tell what really happened in Roswell in 1947 and how it caused the 9/11 attacks. Then it is back into the fun as we drive around Charleston throwing flaming bags of poop on our enemys porches! All that and more on the 78th Episode of Nate and Di!

item.title: NaD Episode 77: To Hell in a Handbasket
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: This is an unplanned wonder gem... well, not entirely unplanned... We had a plan, we just chose not to follow it. We start this one off with another one of Dis increasingly strange prank calls and then we call her mom to wish her a happy birthday and get her opinion of the show and making fun of retards.(she has never heard our show, thank god.) After a discussion with the MIL about 11 foot penises at the local sculpture show among other things, we play a special message from JC Hutchins and Satan himself. NaD News hits home this week, with a really fucked up story about our former employer and a porn bust and Steve Dupont entertains and educates us once again with another installment of Lets Fuck With People. Subscribe, download, listen, and laugh... Then write and tell us about your thoughts!

item.title: NaD Episode 76: Conception of the Anti-Christ
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: OK. Shorter episode, but we decided to drop this one early because it needs to be free, unhindered by other distractions we may create in the course of a normal show - plus Di started taking off her clothes at the end, effectively distracting the man at the mixer... Me. We begin this one concerned that Di may indeed be with child. In her words: The Evil One. Listen as we take the home pregnancy test tonight - Unless youre a perv, she says. We also play some listener feedback, discuss our new satellite dish and the wonders of TIVO, and thank Blue from the Symian Syndicate for the CD he sent this week. Subscribe, download, listen, and laugh... Then write and tell us about your thoughts!

item.title: NaD Episode 75: One license per shaved cat, please.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: The weirdest mix of subjects we can remember on this one... Polygamy, Scatology, Letters to the editor, shaving a cat, a cabbage patch fuckme doll, and so much more. Can you tell Di has PMS Listen as she rants about her new foe, Letter to the Editor Meg, and plots her revenge with a research phone call to the local pet store Never mind that she doesnt even know if this girl Meg really even has a cat. We also kick off a fresh Censored Word Game, tell a story about our real lives, share listener feedback on the makings of green poo and a complaint that we dont thrash the religious folks so much anymore and why. Subscribe, download, listen, and laugh... Then write and tell us about your thoughts!

item.title: NaD Episode 74: Another Bong Bites the Dust
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Another dose of weird from the crazies at Front Butt! NaD 74 was another roller coaster, you join us as Di calls the pet store to check on her constipated parakeet, Rigby. We immediately move right along into a discussion with more scatological references than any previous edition of our show. If this is your first time listening, we apologize for the rude introduction. Derek and Swoopy from Skepticality were here yesterday, and Derek left us in charge of the BatPig Mobile until they return from their cruise next week. We also daydream some about what to do with the truck, and invite listener suggestions. Next, we test our new G-Spot bong from weedcity with less than satisfactory results. In NaD News this week, we make a major announcement about our sponsor and remember Hunter Thompson a year after his death. Fun show, we hope you guys enjoy it!
item.itunes:subtitle: NaD Episode 74: Another Bong Bites the Dust
item.itunes:summary: Another dose of weird from the crazies at Front Butt! NaD 74 was another roller coaster, you join us as Di calls the pet store to check on her constipated parakeet, Rigby. We immediately move right along into a discussion with more scatological references than any previous edition of our show. If this is your first time listening, we apologize for the rude introduction. Derek and Swoopy from Skepticality were here yesterday, and Derek left us in charge of the BatPig Mobile until they return from their cruise next week. We also daydream some about what to do with the truck, and invite listener suggestions. Next, we test our new G-Spot bong from weedcity with less than satisfactory results. In NaD News this week, we make a major announcement about our sponsor and remember Hunter Thompson a year after his death. Fun show, we hope you guys enjoy it!
item.author: webmaster@nateanddi.com
item.itunes:keywords: nate and di, comedy, humor, talk, sex, music, funny, politics, liberalism

item.title: NaD Episode 73: Early Bird Gets the Roses of the Prophet
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Early for once, and another special edition show coming in the next few days! NaD 73 will go down in history as one of our favorites, we really had fun today. Di immediately brings up my striped skin affliction she caused with a bottle of hydrogen peroxide a few nights ago, and things really dont slow down after that. We also discuss our new pets, bibb, yaz, and bird. Plus, we start not one, but TWO new contests tonight. The new Censored Word Game will be up very soon and Di needs a name for her bird. The NaD News on this episode is one of the most fun segments weve ever produced, so listen as Steve Dupont fucks with people at the IHOP in Birmingham, and we search for Roses of the Prophet Mohommad(aka Danishes) all over Charleston, including a little fucking with the local employees at the IHOP ourselves!

item.title: NaD Episode 71: Pimp Cups Overflowing with Cookie Spoons
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: More Weirdness than ever on this show... but also one of our longer episodes. We kick things right off to a fresh start with a new intro and delve right into the strange as Di educates me about Pimp Cups. We also introduce our new segment, Cartoon Mythbusters, with an experiment involving the Cookie Monster, a roll of cookie dough, a metal spoon, and a BIC lighter. All that and much more in this nearly 50 minute show, including a new edition of NaD News with Steve Dupont, a new song from Jimmy G, and all kinds of other weird talk.

item.title: NaD Episode 70: The Trip, the Move, and the Panty Burgler
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Hiya. Remember us? We used to do a podcast... Remember? Way back, like last year? Well. Were back again. So watch out people! Do many of you know a Republican truck driver who wears womens underwear? We do! Episode 70 has finally arrived at your doorstep, so please answer the door before you get panty-burgled in your sleep. Much ado about everything on this one, so many ados we had to cut it short at 40 mins and save some for another time. Listen as we recount our move out of the shed and discuss the new house. Hear the improved audio we discovered when the mics could finally be placed further than 6 inches from each other- Magic!- Just Like our attempts with levitation discussed on the show. We also finally recount our adventures at podcastercon, meeting Senator Edwards, and our bout with the cold from hell that our disease-infested roommate graciously shared with us up there. All that, plus a true story about an uninvited visitor with some interesting habits at our shed, on this, the 1st show from our new studio!

item.title: NaD Episode 69: Sixty-Nine New Years Resolutions
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: The long-awaited episode 69 is here and is the final show for 2005! As the neighborhood kids play with fireworks, we discuss our upcoming move out of the shed, our new jobs, and our trip home for the holidays among other things. Also, we give an update on Chris Wilson from nowthatsfuckedup.com. Dont forget about podcastercon in Chapel Hill next week. Throughout the show, we take a brief look back at the year, and make a few resolutions for 2006. There are a few surprises mixed in as well... 69 anyone? And finally, tonight we share our decision on a QYDJ contract with Podshow.

item.title: NaD Episode 68: Part 1
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Yeah, we know we said Episode 68 would include a re-cap of the live show Saturday night, but we did one better...Heres our greatest monstrosity yet, its the whole damn thing! We are flooding our feed with more than 20 podcasters chatting it up with us during five and a half hours of Podcast Party love. In fact, it was so large, we split this episode into 6 parts! Special thanks to Keeme for coming on as Co-Host and putting up with us for nearly 6 hours, and also to Oblivion for recording and uploading these for us. Weve yet to publish one of these, so we thought the regular audience might enjoy the experience. This is not a typical Nate and Di Show, but we hope you guys enjoy it. Highlights from the evening include a short conversation with Derek and Swoopy from Skepticality, hanging up on Bibb and Yaz again, NaD and Keeme answering the hard hitting questions from PK and J, El Nachos sister telling him not to talk to strangers and to feed his goat, and a chat with Gary Leland from the Podcast Pickle... Contstant laughter and lots more in this Special Edition of NaD. Sorry about the occaisional Skype glitches... those things happen. We have cleaned up the audio a bit and added some nice background grooves, so if you missed it, it sounds better than the live show - and if you made it Saturday night, listen again, cause it sounds betta still! Thanks again to Gary and the Pickle for hosting, all of the prize donors, and of course the guests. We'll do this again very soon, promise. This part includes: Keeme, Gary from Podcast Pickle, and Sledge from I love KNIGHTS

item.title: NaD Episode 67: A Mulatto at the Improv Has a Candy Cane.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Back again, back again! We apologize for the unusually long gap in episodes this week, but we had some major distractions lately... Like a year of TV on DVD to catch up on. We promise, it wont happen again. Anyhow, following my failed attempt to produce a solocast to keep the feed fresh on friday, we got motivated and made our newest NaD creation - Episode 67! We hope you enjoy, the rumor is that it tastes best with cheap wine, but its up to you on that... Tonight, we recount a few escapades from the past week, welcome our nephew Jamal, share another NaD News segment with Steve Dupont, tell about Dis longstanding contribution to the D.A.R.E. program in SC, plus some more shit and stuff like that. Oh. And Di was also unusually jubilant on this one, she started the episode by taking off her clothes for no apparent reason. Fun show.

Tonight, we recount a few escapades from the past week, welcome our nephew Jamal, share another NaD News segment with Steve Dupont, tell about Dis longstanding contribution to the D.A.R.E. program in SC, plus some more shit and stuff like that. Oh. And Di was also unusually jubilant on this one, she started the episode by taking off her clothes for no apparent reason. Fun show.

item.title: NaD #64: Expo Wrap-up Special Edition Episode.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: First of all, we want to thank Michael Haisten for making this possible and everything else he did for us this weekend. Also thanks to all of the donors who helped pay for the room and our drinks and foodstuffs. The "regular" show is coming, but in the meantime, heres a short wrap-up and a bunch of recordings from the iRiver this weekend. We tried to keep the "roving mic in the face" habit at bay(figured enough of that was going on), but we caught plenty of ambient material to share. As we said in the previous posts, the PME was a blast, and well definitely return next year in September for Expo # 2. Dont forget PodcasterCon on January 7th, well be there too.

item.title: NaD #63: The Uh-Oh Show.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: This is our last message to everyone before our big trip to the Portable Media Expo. Long show this time, a whopping 45 minutes! We walk a fine line between humor and nonsense on this one. Hear the Uh-Oh sound, some big news about the show, a commercial parody for a friend, another letter from a crazy lady, a story about our good-will hitchhiking attempts, an all new message segment, and much more! You are also invited to the shed next Wednesday for a screening of the new Robert Greenwald movie, Walmart: The High Cost of Low Prices. See some of you this wekend in Cali, we will be back next Monday with some more NaD goodness for all.

item.title: NaD #62:The not-so-spooky Halloween Spectacular.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Following our most serious show ever, the silly has returned. This is possibly the most weird and random episode yet. Get ready for a rather sedate yet manic offering of topics including, but not limited to: pancake batter, cornflakes, myspace, our bongs new name, letters from crazy people, and aborting and/or exterminating each other. Plus, hear some bonus conversations with some interesting surprise call-in guests. It's kinda ironic our ftp program says "uh-oh!" every time a new show finishes uploading... Really. It's kinda weird. We will have to record that so you can hear it too.

item.title: NaD #61: Now Thats Fucked Up and other stories.
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Well, thanks for the wait. One day behind shcedule, but it was worth it, we assure you. We begin with some typical Nate and Di fare, move on to some more serious matters, and then back to our usual silliness with a musical montage we call Whatever. The Three Branches of Republican Collapse." This newest edition of our ever-evolving podcast features an intervew with Jeremy Morgan, webmaster of freechris.org. On Oct. 7, our friend and fellow podcaster, Chris Wilson, was arrested and charged with 300 counts of obscenity in Polk County, Florida. Chris operates a website that came to national attention when he began trading free meberships for his user-submitted amatuer photo site to troops overseas in exchange for photos from the frontlines of our war on terrorism. Hear some details on his case and how you can help protect our rights to free speech by helping Chris. Let us know if you do, and also send us any audio comments about this case at 361-288-3NAD.

item.description: In this episode, we pay tribute to a fallen comrade, our dedicated PC, Pokie the Pavillion. Pokie fell during her service to the Nate and Di Show as she was struck by lightning while she worked to update the website on Thursday. item.title: NaD #34: 3 Days on the Hills of Atlanta in the Rain.(part 1) 06-14-05
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: We're back, and starting to recover from the past weekend's festivities. This is the first of two episodes from the Music Midtown Festival in Atlanta, GA. This first show represents less than 10 percent of the recordings we made this weekend, over 14 hours to be exact: We take you along to the press registration, getting lost, wandering around getting tore upon margaritas - and the wonderfully abundant other substances available, two performances, and a great demo from a band we met on the trip. Part two will be available Sunday. We'll be updating the site with more of our photos, di's notebook ramblings, our faxes from the festival,and much more.This is just the beginning of our wild chronicles of thecrazy weekend!

item.title: NaD #05: Nate and Di Go To Church!
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Inspired by a recent email urging us to visit a church from a "concerned" listener who wrote us after hearing Episode 3, we decided to heed his advice and scurry right over to downtown Charleston and stop at the first church we thought looked cool. Charleston is the "Holy City", after all, so there were many to choose from. Our visit lasted just over 10 minutes. Right after a truly strange sermon, it was cut unexpectedly short when we were asked to leave by an usher. Our trip wasn't a total loss, though. As you'll hear, we were the most joyful people in attendance! Also, we're proud to introduce NADS-NET, The Nate and Di Shopping Network.

item.title: NaD # 04: Our Special Presidential Episode
item.itunes:author: Nate and Di
item.description: Get ready to hear podcasting history folks! This is a very special edition of the show featuring former President Bill Clinton. Bill arrived in town just days ago, and we sent Diana out in the field this afternoon to get an exclusive interview. Listen carefully as he discusses a wide-ranging variety of subjects. Also, we regret to inform everyone that our new Garage Band has broken up after only 40 seconds.
